data.title: How to Answer ‘Why Are You the Best Person for This Job?’ in an Interview
data.meta_description: Learn how to respond when asked 'why are you the best person for this job?' with example answers that will help you land the job you want.
data.text:
When interviewing for jobs, there are certain questions that most employers will ask regardless of the role or position they’re trying to fill. One such question is, “Why are you the best person for this job?”

While this question can feel abstract and overwhelming to answer, with the right forethought and preparation, you can go into interviews with the foundations you need to answer this question with confidence.

Why do employers ask ‘Why are you the best person for the job?’ in an interview?

Answering this question is an important component of any job interview because employers use it to gauge your enthusiasm for the role, as well as understand how you perceive yourself and your skill set.

When presented with this question, you should come across as confident, passionate, and knowledgeable about the role you’re interviewing for.

How to answer ‘Why are you the best person for this job?’

Tailor your answer to the job description

This question is an opportunity for you to showcase your unique skills, qualifications, and experience.

It requires a bit of thought and preparation to properly answer it but if you take the time to cater your answer to the job description, your answer will resonate more with interviewers.

Highlight your skills and achievements

Start by emphasizing your top skills and abilities that specifically help you fulfill the responsibilities of the position.

Then, mention any education or achievements that demonstrate your qualifications in this field, like certifications, awards, and relevant courses.

Be authentic and honest

When answering this question, be authentic and honest about why you think you’re the right fit for the job.

Instead of overstating your qualifications or stretching the truth, focus on how your strengths line up with what they are looking for in the position.

Explain why you want to work there

The best way to answer this question is to show that you’re passionate about this job and the company.

Talk about why you want to work at the company, such as what values or culture it has that resonate with you.

End your answer by expressing your enthusiasm for the position and emphasizing how much you can contribute to their success.

End with a question when appropriate

When you’re done answering this question, consider ending with a question that shows your interest in the job and your commitment to the company.

For instance, you could ask something like, “What do you think sets me apart from other candidates for this position?” or “What can I do to help ensure success in this role?”

Jeff Su, who offers practical career and productivity tips, breaks down the ideal answer to this question into three parts:

What can you bring to the role?

What you’d like to get out of the role

What makes you unique?

Sample answers for “Why are you the best person for this job?”

Answer for “Why are you the best person for this job?”

I believe I’m the best person for this job because I have a unique combination of skills and experiences that make me well-suited to thrive in this role.

I have a degree in accounting, three years of experience working with financial software, and a passion for creating organizational solutions.

My background uniquely qualifies me to be able to understand complex financial situations quickly and accurately and to provide the team with innovative solutions.

Answer for “Why are you the best person for this job?”

I believe I’m the best person for this job because of my strong technical abilities and enthusiasm for the company.

I have a deep understanding of web development, as evidenced by my five years of experience in the industry, which makes me the perfect candidate to help develop and implement innovative solutions.

Additionally, I’m passionate about this company’s mission and values, which align with my own personal values and drive my enthusiasm for this role.

Answer for “Why are you the best person for this job?”

I believe I’m the best person for this job due to my extensive experience in customer service and my passion for helping others.

I’ve been working in customer service for the past ten years, and have developed strong communication, problem-solving, and relationship-building skills.

Furthermore, I’m passionate about creating positive experiences for customers and taking pride in a job well done.

Sample answer template for “Why are you the best person for this job?”

“I believe I’m the best fit for this job because of the skills and expertise I’ve gained in [FIELD/INDUSTRY] over the past [NUMBER] years.

I think my solid foundation of skills coupled with my passion for learning and innovating, can help me thrive in this role and benefit [COMPANY NAME] at the same time.

[COMPANY NAME’s] commitment to [COMPANY’S VALUES & MISSION] really resonate with me and I’m excited to bring my skills and experience to helping you and your teams realize that vision.”

Why do you think you’re the best person for the job?

When answering “Why are you the best person for this job?”, start by emphasizing your unique skills and qualifications, and highlight any awards or achievements that demonstrate why you’re a great fit for the role.

Don’t forget to show your enthusiasm for the company by explaining why it appeals to you and how your values align with its mission.

And above all, be yourself and answer the question with authenticity and honesty.
